## IAnonymousPaths.register() method

Register `path` as not requiring authentication. `path` should not include the current basePath.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
register(path: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
